snippet.title: Red Dead Redemption - Full Game Walkthrough in 4K [Gold Medals - PS5]
snippet.description:
Red Dead Redemption Full Movie Gold Medal Walkthrough \ Guide in 4K at 30 FPS played on PlayStation 5 (PS4 version via backwards compatibility) - NO COMMENTARY

This video shows how to achieve a Gold Medal Rank in all 58 story missions of Red Dead Redemption.
In order to achieve a Gold Medal, you must always skip all cutscenes, take shortcuts and use Dead Eye and Casual/Normal mode aim to easily score headshots and keep your accuracy high.
In this video all the cutscenes have been edited in using another playthrough.

Rockstar Games Walkthrough Videos Playlist: https://bit.ly/2RP61Bl

► YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/GTASeriesVideos
► INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/GTASeriesNews
► FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/GTASeriesNews
► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/GTASeries
► DISCORD: https://discord.gg/GTASeries

NEW AUSTIN CHAPTER:
0:00 Introduction & Mission #1 - Exodus in America
13:28 Mission #2 - New Friends, Old Problems
23:32 Mission #3 - Obstacles in Our Path
28:27 Mission #4 - This is Armadillo, USA
33:01 Mission #5 - Women and Cattle
40:01 Mission #6 - Wild Horses, Tamed Passions
52:36 Mission #7 - A Tempest Looms
58:58 Mission #8 - Political Realities in Armadillo
1:06:52 Mission #9 - Justice in Pike's Basin
1:16:12 Mission #10 - Old Swindler Blues
1:20:22 Mission #11 - Spare the Rod, Spoil the Bandit
1:31:34 Mission #12 - The Burning
1:37:09 Mission #13 - Hanging Bonnie MacFarlane
1:47:06 Mission #14 - You Shall Not Give False Testimony, Except for Profit
1:57:31 Mission #15 - Exhuming and Other Fine Hobbies
2:08:12 Mission #16 - A Gentle Drive With Friends
2:14:28 Mission #17 - Let the Dead Bury Their Dead
2:19:15 Mission #18 - Liars, Cheats and Other Proud Americans
2:27:07 Mission #19 - Can a Swindler Change His Spots?
2:35:40 Mission #20 - The Sport of Kings, and Liars
2:42:16 Mission #21 - A Frenchman, a Welshman and an Irishman
2:46:43 Mission #22 - Man is Born Unto Trouble
2:56:52 Mission #23 - On Shaky's Ground
3:07:51 Mission #24 - The Assault on Fort Mercer
3:19:04 Mission #25 - We Shall Be Together in Paradise

NUEVO PARAISO CHAPTER:
3:36:09 Mission #26 - Civilization, at Any Price
3:48:47 Mission #27 - The Demon Drink
3:56:48 Mission #28 - Empty Promises
4:05:42 Mission #29 - Mexican Caesar
4:21:09 Mission #30 - The Gunslingers Tragedy
4:31:37 Mission #31 - Landon Ricketts Rides Again
4:43:06 Mission #32 - Lucky in Love
4:49:06 Mission #33 - The Mexican Wagon Train
4:57:09 Mission #34 - My Sister's Keeper
5:02:58 Mission #35 - Must a Savior Die?
5:10:28 Mission #36 - Cowards Die Many Times
5:17:41 Mission #37 - Father Abraham
5:24:27 Mission #38 - Captain De Santa's Downfall
5:31:01 Mission #39 - The Great Mexican Train Robbery
5:45:20 Mission #40 - The Gates of El Presidio
5:57:10 Mission #41 - An Appointed Time

WEST ELIZABETH CHAPTER:
6:09:18 Mission #42 - Bear One Another's Burdens
6:23:19 Mission #43 - Great Men Are Not Always Wise
6:32:58 Mission #44 - At Home With Dutch
6:48:38 Mission #45 - For Purely Scientific Purposes
6:56:26 Mission #46 - The Prodigal Son Returns (To Yale)
7:05:20 Mission #47 - And You Will Know the Truth
7:13:26 Mission #48 - And the Truth Will Set You Free

MARSTON RANCH CHAPTER:
7:27:01 Mission #49 - The Outlaw's Return
7:40:39 Mission #50 - Pestilence
7:43:34 Mission #51 - Old Friends, New Problems
7:52:31 Mission #52 - By Sweat and Toil
7:57:23 Mission #53 - A Continual Feast
8:03:23 Mission #54 - John Marston and Son
8:12:22 Mission #55 - Wolves, Dogs and Sons
8:19:15 Mission #56 - Spare the Love, Spoil the Child
8:25:10 Mission #57 - The Last Enemy That Shall Be Destroyed

EPILOGUE:
8:37:50 Mission #58 - Remember My Family
8:44:38 Closing Credits

#RedDeadRedemption #RDR #GTASeriesVideos

ABOUT US

GTA Series Videos is a dedicated fan-channel in no way tied to Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.

Here you can find all the latest news, video walkthroughs and official trailers of the most successful video games published by Rockstar Games, including Grand Theft Auto series, Red Dead Redemption, Max Payne, L.A. Noire, Bully and many others.

ABOUT RED DEAD REDEMPTION

Journey across the sprawling expanses of the American West and Mexico in Red Dead Redemption, and its zombie-horror companion, Undead Nightmare - now playable on modern consoles. When federal agents threaten his family, former outlaw John Marston is forced to hunt down the gang of criminals he once called friends. Step into the events immediately following the 2018 blockbuster, Red Dead Redemption 2, in the critically acclaimed tale of Marston’s journey to bury his blood-stained past, one man at a time.
